verses.verse: Afterward he <S%H7725>brought<s%> me <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3318>issued<s%> out from <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6921>eastward:<s%> for the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> stood toward the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> from the <S%H3233>right<s%> side of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> at the <S%H5045>south<s%> side of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then <S%H3318>brought<s%> he me out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H5437>led<s%> me <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> to the <S%H2351>utter<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> <S%H6921>eastward;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H6379>ran<s%> out <S%H4325>waters<s%> on the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side.<s%>

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> that had the <S%H6957>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6921>eastward,<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and he <S%H5674>brought<s%> me <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were to the <S%H657>ankles.<s%>

Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H5674>brought<s%> me <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were to the <S%H1290>knees.<s%> Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H5674>brought<s%> me <S%H5674>through;<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were to the <S%H4975>loins.<s%>

Afterward he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand;<s%> and it was a <S%H5158>river<s%> that I <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over:<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H1342>risen,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H7813>swim<s%> in, a <S%H5158>river<s%> that could not be <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> this? Then he <S%H3212>brought<s%> me, and caused me to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river.<s%>

Now when I had <S%H7725>returned,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> on the one side and on the <S%H2088>other.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3318>issue<s%> out toward the <S%H6930>east<s%> <S%H1552>country,<s%> and <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H6160>desert,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> which being <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>thing<s%> that <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8317>moves,<s%> <S%H413>wherever<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> shall <S%H2421>live:<s%> and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> multitude of <S%H1710>fish,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither:<s%> for they shall be <S%H7495>healed;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> thing shall <S%H2425>live<s%> <S%H413>where<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that the <S%H1728>fishers<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on it from <S%H5872>Engedi<s%> even to <S%H5882>Eneglaim;<s%> they shall be a place to <S%H4894>spread<s%> forth <S%H2764>nets;<s%> their <S%H1710>fish<s%> shall be according to their <S%H4327>kinds,<s%> as the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>
But the <S%H1207>miry<s%> places thereof and the <S%H1360>marshes<s%> thereof shall not be <S%H7495>healed;<s%> they shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

And by the <S%H5158>river<s%> on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> thereof, on <S%H2088>this<s%> side and on that side, shall <S%H5927>grow<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>meat,<s%> whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall not <S%H5034>fade,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof be <S%H8552>consumed:<s%> it shall <S%H1069>bring<s%> forth <S%H1069>new<s%> <S%H1061>fruit<s%> according to his <S%H2320>months,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H4325>waters<s%> they <S%H3318>issued<s%> out of the <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall be for <S%H3978>meat,<s%> and the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> thereof for <S%H8644>medicine.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> shall be the <S%H1366>border,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall have two <S%H2256>portions.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> it, <S%H376>one<s%> as well as <S%H251>another:<s%> concerning the <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to your <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to you for <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> from the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon,<s%> as men <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H6657>Zedad;<s%>

<S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> <S%H1268>Berothah,<s%> <S%H5453>Sibraim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath;<s%> <S%H2694>Hazarhatticon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H2362>Hauran.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H2703>Hazarenan,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%> And this is the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

And the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> you shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> from <S%H2362>Hauran,<s%> and from <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and from <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> from the <S%H1366>border<s%> to the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%> And this is the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

And the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H5045>southward,<s%> from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> even to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>strife<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%> And this is the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H5045>southward.<s%>

The <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> also shall be the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> from the <S%H1366>border,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> a man <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5227>over<s%> <S%H5704>against<s%> <S%H5227><s%> <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>
So shall you <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to you according to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that you shall <S%H5307>divide<s%> it by lot for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to you, and to the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you: and they shall be to you as <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H249>country<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> they shall <S%H5307>have<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that in <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojournes,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
